meanings.definition: The lip or liplike part of an organ or structure.
meanings.sent1: The labium of the flower was delicate and pink.
meanings.sent2: She applied lip balm to her labium to keep it moisturized.
meanings.sent3: The labium of the book cover was torn, giving it a quirky look.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a soothing balm on the labium of her heart.
meanings.sent5: The labium of the seashell was intricately patterned, resembling lace.
